page.title: 02DOGGETTS FARM
page.content: {Doggetts Farm _____________ The farm is now owned by Mr.S.W. Squiers who showed us around the farm buildings.The farm passed to him from his grandfather who bought it in 1917 from the Mason family. It was originally much larger, extending as far west as the Ashingdon Road.Sweynes,the priest's house next to this school was once part of Doggetts,but this now belongs to the Diocese of Brentwood.The farm now occupies an area of 1400 acres. The farm is a mixture of old and new buildings.The house is made of parts all added at different times.The earliest part is of unknown date but is thought to be pre-1600's whilst the most modern additions are Victorian.The oldest parts of the house contain a large collection of
